name: A Death Wish
description: A nightmare like no other. This is the story of a little boy that finds him self waking up in his bed, only to discover that nothing is what it seems. Instead of hiding under the covers, the boy decides to get up a take a look around.  Once realizing that he is no longer in his bedroom, rather than taking the safe approach he decides to risk uncertain death against some creatures the world knows nothing about. A Death Wish by Kaleb Taylor
